name: first_seen
label: First seen
description: When the IP-address is first seen in ping.

name: host_alive
label: Alive
description: True if IP-address is online, False if IP-address is offline based on ping results.

name: last_seen
label: Last seen
description: When the IP-address is last pinged successfully.

name: seen_enabled
label: Scan
description: True if IP-address is on ping process, False if not.
